# [Interview #974: AMOL Signing Report - J. Dauro, Entry #55](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=974#55)

#### Question

Who is writing the movie script for
*Eye of the World*
?

#### Brandon Sanderson

It's being written in house at Universal.
